short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that has a 1/5 chance to load the 'Never Gonna Give You Up' video when opening a random webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download this extension to prank your friends. This extension Rickrolls you 1/5 times when opening up a random webpage.
